description: Aconcagua ML Tights long Men. An optimal body climate thanks to the combination of two high-quality, functional fleece materials. While Polartec® Power Stretch® Pro™ provides warmth and an abrasion-proof nylon surface on the front and back, we use elasticated Pontetorto® Tecnostretch in the lower leg area for excellent moisture management.
name: Mammut Aconcagua ML Tights, Long - Mens
